languages.text: "Или же тебе просто солгали, и никакого гемункула на этом мире нет. В любом случае, можешь спросить у местных — их псайкеры говорят с деревьями или вроде того. Может, какой-нибудь лютодуб тебе что-нибудь да расскажет". {n}Ироничная ухмылка рассекает повеселевшее лицо Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Или же тебе просто солгали, и никакого гемункула на этом мире нет. В любом случае, можешь спросить у местных — их псайкеры говорят с деревьями или вроде того. Может, какой-нибудь лютодуб тебе что-нибудь да расскажет". {n}Ироничная ухмылка рассекает повеселевшее лицо Вольного Торговца.{/n}

languages.text: "Or you were lied to, and there is no Haemonculus on this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or some such nonsense. Maybe one of their 'dire oaks' will tell you something." {n}He offers you a sarcastic smirk, enjoying his little joke.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Или же тебе просто солгали, и никакого гемункула на этом мире нет. В любом случае, можешь спросить у местных — их псайкеры говорят с деревьями или вроде того. Может, какой-нибудь лютодуб тебе что-нибудь да расскажет". {n}Ироничная ухмылка рассекает повеселевшее лицо Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Or you had been lied to, and there's no Haemonculus in this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or something like that. Maybe one of the Dire Oaks will tell you something, after all." {n}The ironic grin splits the cheerful face of the Rouge Trader.{/n}

"Or you had been lied to, and there's no Haemonculus in this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or something like that. Maybe one of the Dire Oaks will tell you something, after all." {n}The ironic grin splits the cheerful face of the Rouge Trader.{/n}

"Or you had been lied to, and there's no Haemonculus in this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or something like that. Maybe one of the Dire Oaks will tell you something, after all." {n}The ironic grin splits the cheerful face of the Rogue Trader.{/n}

Maybe one of the Dire Oaks will tell you something, after all." {n}The ironic grin splits the cheerful face of the Rogue Trader.{/n}

"Or you were lied to, and there is no Haemonculus on this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or some such nonsense. Maybe one of their 'dire oaks' will tell you something." {n}He offers you a sarcastic smirk, enjoying his little joke.{/n}

"Or you were lied to, and there is no Haemonculus on this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or some such nonsense. Maybe one of their 'dire oaks' will tell you something." {n}He offers you a sarcastic smirk, enjoying his little joke.{/n}

languages.text: «O le han mentido y no existe ningún Hemónculo en este planeta. En cualquier caso, puede preguntar a los lugareños; por lo visto sus psíquicos hablan con los árboles, o algo parecido. Quizá alguno de esos robles terribles le cuente algo, después de todo». {n}Sonríe sarcásticamente, disfrutando con su propia broma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Or you were lied to, and there is no Haemonculus on this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or some such nonsense. Maybe one of their 'dire oaks' will tell you something." {n}He offers you a sarcastic smirk, enjoying his little joke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «O le han mentido y no existe ningún Hemónculo en este planeta. En cualquier caso, puede preguntar a los lugareños; por lo visto sus psíquicos hablan con los árboles, o algo parecido. Quizá alguno de esos salvajes le cuente algo, después de todo». {n}Una sonrisa irónica desdibuja la expresión alegre del Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: “也可能是你被骗了，这个世界根本没有什么血伶人。不管怎么样，你尽可以问问当地人。他们的灵能者可以和树说话，或是类似的胡说八道。说不定某棵‘橡树精灵’会告诉你某些事情吧。”{n}卡里戈斯露出了充满讽刺意味的笑容，觉得自己的玩笑很有趣。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Or you were lied to, and there is no Haemonculus on this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or some such nonsense. Maybe one of their 'dire oaks' will tell you something." {n}He offers you a sarcastic smirk, enjoying his little joke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “也可能是你被骗了，这个世界根本没有什么血伶人。不管怎么样，你尽可以问问当地人。他们的灵能者可以和树或者类似的东西说话，说不定某棵‘恐怖橡树’会告诉你某些事情吧。”{n}温特斯凯尔愉悦的脸上露出了带有讽刺意味的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: « À condition qu'il y ait vraiment un hémoncule dans ce monde. On pourrait vous avoir menti. Mais vous pouvez toujours vous adresser aux autochtones ; leurs psykers parlent aux arbres ou je ne sais quoi. Les chênes pourront peut-être vous renseigner, » {n}ajoute le libre-marchand avec un sourire sardonique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Or you were lied to, and there is no Haemonculus on this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or some such nonsense. Maybe one of their 'dire oaks' will tell you something." {n}He offers you a sarcastic smirk, enjoying his little joke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « À condition qu'il y ait vraiment un hémoncule dans ce monde. On pourrait très bien vous avoir menti. Mais vous pouvez toujours vous adresser aux autochtones ; leurs psykers parlent aux arbres ou je ne sais quoi. Les chênes pourront peut-être vous renseigner, » {n}déclare le libre-marchand avec un sourire ironique sur son visage enjoué.{/n}

languages.text: 「あるいは、お前は騙されていて、この世界にはハモンキュラスなど存在しないのかもしれん。いずれにせよ、現地民に尋ねてみればいい。彼らの異能者は木と話をするらしいからな。ダイア・オークスの誰かが何か教えてくれるかもしれない」{n}皮肉な笑みが、自由開拓者の陽気な顔を裂いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Or you were lied to, and there is no Haemonculus on this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or some such nonsense. Maybe one of their 'dire oaks' will tell you something." {n}He offers you a sarcastic smirk, enjoying his little joke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あるいは、お前は騙されていて、この世界にはハモンキュラスなど存在しないのかもしれん。いずれにせよ、現地民に尋ねてみればいい。彼らの異能者は木と話をするらしいからな。ダイア・オークスの誰かが何か教えてくれるかもしれない」{n}皮肉な笑みが、ローグトレーダーの陽気な顔を裂いた。{/n}

languages.text: "Oder man hat Euch angelogen, und es gibt auf dieser Welt gar keinen Haemonculus. Wie dem auch sei, Ihr könnt die Einheimischen fragen — ihre Psioniker können mit Bäumen sprechen oder irgend so ein Unsinn. Vielleicht verrät Euch ja eine ihrer 'Düstereichen' etwas." {n}Er grinst sarkastisch vor Freude über seinen kleinen Scherz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Or you were lied to, and there is no Haemonculus on this world at all. In any case, you can ask the locals — their psykers talk to the trees or some such nonsense. Maybe one of their 'dire oaks' will tell you something." {n}He offers you a sarcastic smirk, enjoying his little joke.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oder man hat Euch angelogen, und es gibt auf dieser Welt gar keinen Haemonculus. Wie dem auch sei, Ihr könnt die Einheimischen fragen — ihre Psioniker können mit Bäumen sprechen oder so etwas in der Art. Vielleicht verrät Euch eine der Düstereichen ja etwas." {n}Ein ironisches Grinsen macht sich auf dem fröhlichen Gesicht des Freihändlers breit.{/n}
